name: Bazaarify
tag_list: business-reviews, business-reputation, testimonials, appointments, smb-marketing, reviews, reputation, business
overview:
Bazaarify is an innovative SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) platform enabling businesses to amplify their good reputation, everywhere. Think of it as Yelp-on-steroids, but built to benefit the business interest.

• With Bazaarify, businesses tap a direct line into what their customers are saying about them. Bazaarify gathers reviews and ratings from the top sites and aggregates them with new reviews delivered through auto-generated customer review requests.

• Using Bazaarify, businesses control their online reputation by moderating the release of customer reviews. Approve, respond to, or hold customer ratings. Engage clients, gather essential feedback and resolve customer concerns—in real time.

• Bazaarify amplifies a business’ good reputation, everywhere. Approved reviews are auto-uploaded to the business website, to their Bazaarisite and to favorite social media sites, for increased referrals and improved search engine rankings.

The Bazaarify platform also includes: • One-click professional website (bazaarisite) that gets a business in the game, now. • Automated appointment reminders, resulting in from fewer customer no-shows.
